Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 101st overall pick, by New Jersey in 1977...
Injured on 6/24/1980 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/30/1980 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from New Jersey to Plum Grove on 4/15/1981 (Going to NJ: 1B A. Rosario. Going to PG: SS S. Alvarado, P A. Pedroza)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/26/1982, off Christopher Wilmore (MAN)...
Traded from Plum Grove to Halifax on 7/30/1982 (Going to PG: 1B H. Severance. Going to HAL: SS S. Alvarado, RF B. Doucette)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/2/1983, off Roogie Rigsby (SYR)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against West Texas on 8/3/1984...
Traded from Halifax to Troy on 2/5/1985 (Going to TRO: SS S. Alvarado. Going to HAL: 1B D. Audet, P L. Zabala)...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/21/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against West Texas on 4/23/1989...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Northeastern on 5/13/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1990, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 5/10/1991...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Northeastern on 8/2/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1992, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1992, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 18 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 9/3/1992...
